pr_title: Resolve the issues of codestyle of nacos-config module for phase7

timeline.message: Resolve the issues of codestyle of nacos-config module for phase7

timeline.bodyText: Please check indent in this file
timeline.author: KomachiSion

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,31 +21,32 @@
 import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
 
 /**
- * log util
+ * Log util.
  *
  * @author Nacos
  */
+@SuppressWarnings("checkstyle:ConstantName")

replies.bodyText: Many Log member variables defined in this class are referenced in many classes. Do they need to be modified in code format?
replies.author: zhangjidi2016

replies.bodyText:
Use IDEA‘s refactor-rename feature, IDEA will help you change them all.
You just change the original location.
If you don't know how to use, doesn't matter. just remove the SuppressWarnings, I will fix it.
replies.author: KomachiSion

timeline.author: KomachiSion

@@ -23,11 +23,11 @@
 import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
 
 /**
- * 根据IP进行流控, 控制单个IP的数量以及IP总量
+ * According to IP flow control, control the number of individual IP and IP total.
  *
  * @author leiwen.zh

replies.bodyText: There are more than two consecutive uppercase letters in the class name, but IP is generally indicated with uppercase letters.
replies.author: zhangjidi2016
